title: LIVE 3 MONTH FOR FREE!! ULTRA LUXE! BEACHFRONT STUDIOS BROOKLYN
posting_body: ['"NO FEE" Luxury Living In Brooklyn\'s Newest Beachfront Complex!!!', '*PAY $2415 EACH MONTH FOR ONLY 9MONTHS * LIVE 3MONTHS FOR FREE ON 12MONTH LEASE*', '*IF THIS WORKS FOR YOU PLEASE CONTACT BAMBI ANYTIME TO FIND YOUR NEW HOME*', 'LIMITED TIME ONLY:', '* Live 3 Months Free On A 12 Month Lease', '* Net Effective Rent Advertised Reflects Live 3 Months Free', 'On 12 Month Lease', '*', 'No Broker Fee *', 'No Amenities Fee', '* Call For Current Availability / Live 3 Free Month Free', 'And Prices Are Subject To Change', '* All imagery are for illustrative purposes only.', '======================================================', 'Apartment Features:', '* Over-Sized Windows * Solar Shades* White Oak Plank Floors', '* Pearl Jasmine Countertops and White Lacquer Cabinets', '* S.S Appliances * Gas Range * Refrigerator with Icemaker * Dishwasher', '* Microwave', '* Full Size', 'In Home Laundry', '* King-Size Bedroom With Ample Closet Space', '*', 'Modern Full Size Bath * White Quartz Countertops * Oak Vanities', '=======================================================', 'Amenities', '* 24-hour Attended Lobby with Valet / Concierge Service', '* Indoor 50-ft Swimming Pool with His/Hers Locker Room', '* Rooftop Lounge * Catering Kitchen *', 'Barbecues *', 'Oceanfront views', '*', 'Oceanfront Sun Terrace *', 'Putting Green * Bocce Court', '* Children’s Play Area* Outdoor Movie theater', '* State-of-The-Art Gym * Telescopes * Yoga Studio', '* Residents Lounge with Library *Billiards Table', '* Widescreen TVs', '* Fireplace * On-Site Tenant Storage * Bike Storage', '*', 'Grocery * Pharmacy Coming Soon....', '=====================================================', 'Transportation:', 'X28 and X38 express buses to Manhattan right outside your door', '======================================================', 'PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CALL/TEXT/EMAIL RESIDENTIAL HUNTERS 917.951.5062', 'ANYTIME TO SCHEDULE YOUR PRIVATE TOUR AND FIND YOUR NEW HOME.-:)']
